summary: An ex-cop is hired by a pimp to find missing call girls and the man responsible behind their abduction.
cast: Emraan Hashmi|Jacqueline Fernandez|Prashant Narayanan|Sulagna Panigrahi|Sudhanshu Pandey|Sandeep Sikand|Amardeep Jha|Bikramjeet Kanwarpal|Shekhar Shukla|Raj Gopal Iyer|Surendra Rajan|Tanay Hemant Ambegowankar|Rasika Dugal|Shashi Kiran|Kiren Jogi|Deepjyoti|Gargi Nandi|Nader Ali Khan|Rajeev Mishra|Tushar Jain|Piyush Suhaney|Amit Shirivastava|Abhijit Lahiri|Imran Khan|Jhuma Biswas|Premchand|Nilofer|Arman Menzies|Banwarhlal Jhol|Zarine Variava|Shweta Kawatra|Yana Gupta|Shree Rammy Pandey
title: Murder 2
